Text:
Good martial arts movie. This is one of those movies you watch for the martial arts action more than for the story or acting or whatever. All martial arts are real, no special effects, CG or stunt doubles in this one.

Good quality torrent too. Thanks for the upload!
The write up sounds like ONG BAk 1 " The Beginning"       and not Ong Bak 2.
if u were actually a fan of tonys u would know that ong bak - thai warrior has nothing to do with ong bak 2 and 3
